items.title: New YA Book Releases for October 8, 2025
items.description: Secret theater societies, pills to cure heartbreak, scam artists, fight clubs, and more in this week's massive roundup of new YA releases.

items.title: South Carolina Students and Librarians Sue State Education Superintendent Over Book Bans
items.description: South Carolina public school students and school librarians file a lawsuit against the state's education superintendent over book bans.
